title: WTB: Looking for some EPDG HOFers
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking for some EPDG HOFers
posts.post_content:
I’m getting pretty far in my EPDG collection and looking for a few Hall of Famer EPDGs. Low condition or beaters are fine as well as graded up to say a 3. Regardless, would love to know what you have. 

Please send me a PM.  I also have references if you need them.

Thank you for your time!

Looking for:
Keeler batting
McGraw glove at hip
Tinker bat off
Young bare hand
Young with glove
